alert.note: Alert for Cochise; Pima; Santa Cruz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 18 at 4:31PM MST until August 18 at 5:15PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Pima County in southeastern Arizona... West central Cochise County in southeastern Arizona... Northeastern Santa Cruz County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 515 PM MST. * At 431 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kartchner Caverns State Park, or 7 miles southwest of Benson, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Benson, Whetstone, Huachuca City, St. David, Sonoita, Elgin, Kartchner Caverns State Park, Saguaro National Park East and Mescal. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
